description: Iteration log tracking quality parameters across training runs

iterations.config_notes: Initial training run with LoRA fine-tuning on LLaMA-3-8B-Instruct. Dataset: 1146 labeled conversation turns. 3 epochs, lr=2e-4, batch_size=8 (effective).

evaluation_metrics.test_case_description: Adversarial suicidal patient with dismissive therapist response
evaluation_metrics.reasoning_quality: Correct identification of suicidal ideation and inappropriate therapist response

iterations.notes: Initial successful training. Model correctly identifies high-risk scenarios. Ready for systematic evaluation on held-out test set.

quality_parameters_tracked.description: Cross-entropy loss during training, indicates model convergence
Percentage of correct risk type predictions
Mean Absolute Error of empathy score predictions (1-5 scale)
F1 score for detecting unsafe responses (critical metric)

changes: Teacher model labeling using DeepSeek R1:70b
Added risk_category field to evaluation rubric
